issue.title: [R][CI] Fix caching for R mingw build
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16803](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16803). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Caching is not working for the libarrow mingw builds due to overlapping cache keys: https://github.com/apache/arrow/runs/6819961123?check_suite_focus=true#step:21:2

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16803?focusedCommentId=17555091) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 13379
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13379>
